text: THE JOURNEY OF "ANANYA" STARTED IN RAMNARAIN RUIA COLLEGE AS A ONEACT PLAY.
TODAY, I FEEL EMOTIONAL WHILE PRESENTING IT AS A MOVIE.
I THANK ALL MY GURUS, FRIENDS, AND COLLEAGUES
FOR HELPING ME ON THIS JOURNEY.  PRATAP MADHAVRAO PHAD
Mr. Sarpotdar, think about it. You can still back down.
Are you sure you can do it?
will be the most memorable ride in your life.
Please tell me the patient's name!
This year, the M.Com gold medal goes to…
SAVITRIBAI PHULE PUNE UNIVERSITY GRADUATION CEREMONY 201920
What's with all the cheering? Hey, come on!
Don't be so modest all the time. Hey…
I mean show some excitement. I just got a first class,
yet I'm more excited than you.
Hey, Ananya, will you marry me?
Hey, shut up. What are you You know you're a serial heartbreaker.
That must be the 100th guy you rejected. Shut up.
You know I'll only think about all this after I become a CA.
Madam, you're great. You're impossible. Hey
You are What rubbish! I won't spare you, wait!
Hey, what is this? She's been waiting for you for so long. This is not done.
Hey, don't say anything about her. Oh, really?
I agree your dad gifted you this bicycle, but you just love it too much.
She might even replace me as a bridesmaid at your wedding.
I want both of you as my bridesmaids. You're impossible!
Oh my God, I'm dead. What? What happened?
Would you just tell me what happened? "Mom has summoned me.
So, I'd better hurry up and flee."
Okay, bye. I'll see you later.
Yes, have a safe ride. You too.
Please step on it. It's urgent. Yes, sir.
What about it? It's in the southwest.
Isn't that great? Not at all.
I have been avoiding this topic for so long,
Because now, I have understood the science of architecture.
Okay. We changed the direction of the cupboard,
and boom, Ananya got a medal. That's right.
And poor Ananya thinks she got a medal because of her studies!
I agree with you. A hundred percent.
We'll do as you say. Okay.
Build a wall there, and then you'll see.
What can I see after building a wall though!
Nikam, come and help me, please.
Where will you keep your new medals? There is no space left in your cupboard.
You can keep your medals in his cupboard.
I mean it's completely empty. He hasn't won any medals, so
What did you say? Hey, careful! Don't pull my hair!
Just watch. One day, Mr. Dhananjay's cupboard
Your friend here is a scholar, right? Yes, she is.
Then tell her to clear the CA final exams on the first attempt.
She will. What will you do in return?
I'll sing her praises in public.
Done. Ananya, challenge accepted, okay? Yes
You'd better not run and hide when she clears her exams!
I know we're just joking around,
but I can't accept this challenge.
Hey, shut up. She's not scared. No,
he's right. I am scared. Why?
Because then I would have to see my brother lose the challenge.
You're dead meat! Bro, no. Stop it.
You'll hurt yourself! Hey, what's happening?
Guys, you'll fall, careful. Dhananjay, what happened? Calm down.
What is it? Yeah, tell me.
You are so going to lose.
Dhananjay, you don't have to wait for her results to sing her praises.
I have fixed Ananya's marriage with a guy.
Yes. What? Ananya, don't tell me! What's this?
If you hear the guy's name,
then, even now, you'll shower her with your praises.
Wow, that's great. When did this happen?
Yes, I know. They're big shots in our village.
But they're not concerned about our financial condition.
They just want a beautiful, educated, and a wellbehaved girl.
But Dad, what about my CA finals?
That's why we've only agreed to do the engagement now.
The wedding will happen after your exam.
Still, don't you think we're rushing it?
Of course, Dad. Then just wait and watch.
Your life will be filled with so much joy
that both of your hands won't be enough to contain it.
If you don't like him, I'll respect your decision.
The doctor will speak to you once he's here.
This is a small gift from us.
Where is he? Please have a seat.
He's our neighbor. I live right there.
Oh, God! What are you doing?
He's got a distinction in MBA. I see.
He's currently looking for a job.
That's great. All the best. Thank you.
And they are the owners of MS Corporation.
They just knew each other formally.
Then where did this marriage come from? He saw Ananya's photo
and fell in love with her? Just like that?
Which direction do you face while sleeping?
Go and serve them this. But
Ask them if they'd like to have something.
But I must say, the carrot halvah is amazing.
Okay, but I loved that she lied.
Anyway, if you want to ask her something, please…
In fact, if she asks me to sing, I'll gladly do it.
Even my wife and Shekhar won't mind showcasing their skills.
I'd like to say something if you guys don't mind.
it's not like I didn't like anyone.
I never met anyone who would make me go…
We'll take your leave, Mr. Deshmukh. Yeah.
We'll be waiting for Ananya's answer. Yes, sir.
please come and meet me in my office.
I'd like you to join our company as a business development manager.
How did this happen? Ananya was on her bicycle
Deshmukh, what did the doctor say?
No, Deshmukh I'm very happy today.
No… I won't listen to you.
Ananya found her happiness, but even I found something today.
We had a big house and our own farm. We were rich.
My dad was a simple man. He was very naive.
took advantage of my dad's simple nature.
in the name of socalled brotherhood.
That night, I decided to go and question my uncle.
We left our village, our home, and came to Pune only because she insisted.
But then, all of a sudden, Sunita left me.
Again, I ended up being alone.
I just didn't know what to do.
And these scoundrels from our village
They would say, "He's acting as if he's some big shot."
I'll make sure my uncle witnesses the grandeur of Ananya's wedding.
At the wedding, these scoundrels will raise their hands to bless the couple,
but their heads will be hanging in shame.
I can't wait to bruise my uncle's ego…
Remember me? I am Shekhar Sarpotdar.
I know I have been ignoring you a lot lately.
But what can I do? Tell me.
I read your WhatsApp messages more than my books nowadays.
and listen to your voice messages.
I talk to you every day on my way home.
And then, you FaceTime me, and I…
We're going on a long drive.
Are you planning to see me
By the way, what is it called?
What do couples exchange at the wedding? Vows.
Are you directly going to see me then?
Did you forget that your parents want an educated girl as their daughterinlaw?
What if I fail the exam and they refuse to accept me?
Not a problem. I'll leave them for you.
Thank you. Thank you so much. No, I'm not joking.
I promise once I feel I'm well prepared for the exam,
Okay, thrice a month. That's it. Okay, done.
Right now, we're going on a long drive.
on a long drive next month Okay, fine.
Keep studying hard. Do well in the exam.
Make your family proud. Who am I, anyway? Right?
No problem. Bye. Listen to me Okay.
But even I have one condition.
Mr. Sarpotdar, think about it. You can still back down.
Are you sure you can do it?
will be the most memorable ride in your life.
He's had a minor injury. There is nothing to worry about.
I shouldn't have said yes to her.
We should have gone by car.
Shekhar, please don't think about it now.
Okay. Please take care of Ananya.
If you need any help No.
What happened? Are you in pain?
No, there is something in my eye. Okay.
So, he had come to see you.
But he said you were asleep.
He said he'd come to see you later.
He was feeling really bad about what happened to you.
In fact, all of us love you.
You know what? Mr. Sarpotdar had come to see me.
Don't think that everything's finished, alright?
Don't ever think that I'd be embarrassed to walk with you
No. You'd better not think that.
Just take care of yourself, dear. Don't worry about anything else.
He said he'd come to see you later.
Don't think that everything's finished, alright?
Don't ever think that I'd be embarrassed to walk with you
You didn't take me seriously earlier, but at least, listen to me now.
Rama, it was just an accident.
Ananya was discharged from the hospital yesterday.
We took her home. So, I thought I should inform you.
He had said he'd come to see her.
Oh, you'll be coming to see her together!
Deshmukh, come on, hurry up. Sir Yes, coming.
He's just worried about your wedding. Nothing else.
Don't worry. Everything will be alright.
Bro, I think we should tell him…
that what he wants is not going to happen now.
Because Shekhar Won't say no to you.
that he would fix my meeting with his company's HR for my job.
Dad Dad, I don't want to get married.
Yes. I don't want to be a burden on anyone.
you were telling me something else before some time.
I was telling you exactly this, but I guess you didn't get it.
Dad, please try to understand. Call them right now
and tell them that I don't want to get married.
Ananya, do you think marriage is a joke?
I have already told everyone in the village. All our relatives know about it.
You will have to get married someday, right?
Everything might not be so easy then.
Just break off the engagement before they break it off.
But why would they break it off? Exactly.
Dear, Mr. Sarpotdar held my hand
Do you not believe me? Let's call them.
I'll talk to them. Dad, don't. Please tell him.
Why are you being impatient? Please tell him to stop.
you were going to come to see Ananya, right?
I wanted to tell you this facetoface, but
we can go ahead with this wedding anymore.
I hope you understand where we're coming from.
Shekhar purposely left without meeting me, Dad.
I'll manage. I'll live on my own.
you are most important to me.
After what happened, my family should have felt bad.
But they are feeling angry. Can you blame them?
After what the Sarpotdars did to us…
But I didn't expect him to marry me after the accident.
In fact, I would have requested him not to marry me.
he didn't even say goodbye to me before leaving.
you will not think about Shekhar ever.
You will not even talk about him…
Sir, tea. I am looking for a nurse for Ananya.
But Dad doesn't seem to understand.
He says that even though I am an MBA,
right now, my degree is of no use, so I should just do…
In short, he's okay with me doing a random job
as long as I'm earning money.
I told him that we should call some girl from the village who needs work.
No one listens to me anyway.
Leave it. Pass me that file.
Your friend here is a scholar, right? Yes, she is.
Then tell her to clear the CA final exams on the first attempt.
She will. What will you do in return?
I'll sing her praises in public.
Come out now. If not for you, at least, take a break for your books!
Dad, I'm almost done. Just two minutes. Okay.
that once they remove my dressing,
I'll start my CA preparations again.
Priyanka will write my exams for me.
And yes, you don't have to get a nurse for me.
Would you please stop irritating me? No! What will you do?
Do whatever you want! Alright! That's it!
If my certificates don't have any value, why keep them?
Right! What else can you do!
You can't do anything anyway! That's right!
Bro, please wait. I can't do anything.
After all, I am your son. What did you say?
Your uncle stole your property from right under your nose.
He couldn't do anything about it. Bro, please stop.
Listen, bro Ananya, don't come between us!
My situation right now is not that different.
Everything is happening right in front of my eyes, but I'm helpless.
What did you do? Are you really asking me that?
Even in that situation, I stood on my own feet. I raised you both.
But you forgot all that. You only remembered
that your father didn't do anything then!
But let me tell you one thing!
I was waiting for a perfect opportunity.
And I had got that opportunity.
I had planned to go to the village after Ananya's wedding
and show off in front of everyone who had laughed at me once.
Everything was going as per my plan, but then, this happened and
We can't do anything now, Dad.
I can still teach them a lesson.
I swear I will teach them a lesson! I won't spare them!
It's of no use now, Dad.
You should have stood your ground then.
I don't know about your respect,
but you could have surely saved our property.
It'd have been of some use to me today. What?
What do I have? Tell me.
I am begging for a job despite having a distinction in MBA.
Apparently, a distinction is not enough. Because others have strong contacts,
or luck, or money that they can offer as a bribe in exchange for a job.
By the way, who told you to go on a long drive on a bicycle?
Shekhar was insisting on going by car, right?
But no, you just had to go by your stupid bicycle, hadn't you?
And then we all know what happened! I'm telling you…
I got a job, but she just couldn't be happy for me.
all she ever wanted to do was outshine me.
Did you ever think about anyone else other than her?
Ananya's laugh, Ananya this, Ananya that! You were only bothered about her!
Go ahead and praise her to the skies!
Have you gone mad? What are you saying?
Because of you, I lost my job Stop it, Dhananjay!
Step back! Have you gone mad?
Throw away that damn bicycle! Just go inside!

that humans don't have hands since birth.

She insisted on not telling you anything.
Because she wanted to prove herself first.
She's the one who had an accident,
but you two were behaving as if you became handicapped.
She stood up on her own feet…
and inspired many like me in her journey.
It doesn't matter if we're heading in the wrong direction.
As long as we have a strong determination
that my daughter is my real treasure.
Like an idiot, I was looking for it outside.
I feel ashamed to even ask for Ananya's forgiveness.
When will we be getting Ananya's final result from the institute?
Okay, then I need your help.
You became a CA on your first attempt.
I'm sorry, but do I know you?
This is perfect, but the one before that was not needed.
You don't know me because we're meeting for the first time.
Can I get some chilled water?
Can you please tell me who you are? "Please"?
Come on, don't be so formal, Ananya.
Had you not been so formal,
I would have given you a better answer.
Actually, it's not important whether I'm being formal or informal.
It's important to know who you are. There you are.
How do you know my name? Someone from your building told me.
Not exactly. That would be odd.
I have just been following you to your library.
You mean you come to my library?
Yes, the corner near the window is my spot.
Now don't tell me you have also taken the CA final exam with me.
No, I wouldn't lie like that.
But yes, I have clicked your many pictures.
Today, I am giving it to you because…
Wish you a very happy birthday, Ananya.
Okay. Now, can you tell me why you're doing this?
Yes, sure. In fact, I was dying to tell you this.
Nothing. Don't think about it much. Just say yes.
Then we'll get married. And why would I do that?
Look, Ananya, I'm ready to tell you everything about me.
But what if I don't want to hear it?
Doesn't matter. So, you already know my name. It's Jai Dixit.
I'm 28 years old. I passed my BSc exam on my second attempt.
To be honest, I don't earn a lot.
But I'm happy with whatever I earn.
I wake up at 11:00 a.m. every day.
I drink when I get bored, and I smoke… often.
What a personality! What a biodata!
God bless you. Now, please leave.
We haven't even gotten to the best part yet.
Talk to the table then. Ananya!
At least, accept my gift. You didn't even finish your meal.
More importantly, you didn't let me finish my intro.
Come on, kid. Let the wooing begin.
The only thing that has managed to impress me more than you is this camera.
I swear, Ananya. It has taught me a lot. Listen, Ananya.
This camera taught me a lot.
It taught me how to focus on important things in life
and your favorite moment will freeze forever.
Then you can carry it your whole life.
Interesting, right? This is my passion now.
Please don't think that Excuse me!
Don't worry, I'm not feeling pity for myself.
But even I have a choice.
Happy birthday to you! Happy birthday to you!
Happy birthday to you! Happy birthday to you!
Happy birthday, dear Ananya! Happy birthday, dear Ananya!
Happy birthday to you! Happy birthday to you!
Happy birthday to you! Happy birthday to you!

And how do you know me?

He was not in your college. No.
He was not in your CA class. No.
Not just me, all of us are here.

and discuss this? No, listen to me.
Good point. Let's sit and discuss this.

the plain one. Oh my God!

Dad, what about you? I'll just have a taste.
Now, if you have any questions
Ananya! Stop her. What happened to her?
The girl just wouldn't let us eat.
Should I make it or not?
Go ahead. Somebody will eat it.
I think she's upset about the photo.
Okay, but whose photo is it?
Ananya's. Why do you have it?
He must have clicked it. Don't you see he has a camera?
No. They are going to find out someday.
What are they going to find out? That I want to marry you.

You want to get her married, right? Yes.
Then what's the issue? She is a nice girl. She is beautiful.
You are right. We want to get her married…
Ananya, how could you not tell me? You should have talked to us.
Now, only I'll speak! If someone interrupts me,
I'll jump in the water. Hey, come on.
I have nothing to do with him.
In fact, he met me yesterday for the first time.
Even yesterday, he was talking rubbish. And now, he's come here too.
Except for the "talking rubbish" part, everything else is true.
How can you talk to my daughter like that?
Exactly. How else should I have talked to her?
I mean how can you just say you love her like that?
You Is there any other way to say that?
No, I mean, how dare you propose marriage to her
Marriage is the next step of love, Dad.
It does sound a bit funny, doesn't it?
Nikam, Dhananjay, are you guys going to do something, or should I
No, Dad Bro, wait. Let me handle this.
Otherwise, we'll be forced to make a complaint against you. So, just leave.
It's not going to help anyone.
Instead, if you just say yes to me, it'll be very helpful.
Priyanka, I can't handle him anymore.
You know what the problem is?
We need to have communication, but there is only confusion.
See, I can understand. You guys are very happy.
This news is hard to digest. But it's okay. We'll talk about it later.
Okay? Now, I'll get going because I'm a bit busy.
This guy was a pain in the neck. I know, right?
I still don't know who he is!
I need to go somewhere urgently.
Will you please show him around the NGO? Yes, ma'am. Don't worry.
Ms. Smita asked me to show you around the NGO.
I have been trying to get in touch with you for a long time.
You'll be happier after meeting the kids in the NGO, sir.
This NGO has been doing phenomenal work
for the welfare of physically handicapped children for the past 12 years.
They allow admission to only 50 students every year
so that they can attend to each of them personally.
I want to talk to you.
Yes, sir. We will talk to the kids.
But before that, let me give you a brief introduction to the NGO.
Here, we have two types of handicapped kids.
Those who are born handicapped and those who became handicapped after an accident.
But the struggle of those who become handicapped
Ananya, I know I have hurt you.
You are upset with me. Hello.
You might even be mad at me.
Sometimes, we end up doing things that we never intend to do.
Because of certain bitter experiences in our lives,
Here, they teach us to overcome those feelings.
After that accident, everything changed, Ananya.
What else could I have done?
It sure does feel difficult in the beginning.
But eventually, we learn to deal with it. Even I was hurt because of what happened!
Let's talk to the kids, sir.
Our second task is to teach children to be independent.
I agree I should have come to see you Satish.
Hi. I should have talked to you
I didn't know how my friends and family would react to my decision.
I just didn't know what to do. Santosh, Sangita,
and Irfan. Why don't you understand?
He's a part of the Indian Wheelchair Cricket Team.
How is the practice going? No matter what happens…
Mom and Dad would have never agreed to this.
Sir, he just finished the trek of Fort Sinhgad.
And he wishes to go to many more such treks, right?
A few months ago, Om was not even able to step out of his house.
Because his parents were not allowing him to go out.
They were ashamed to go out with him in public.
But today, his parents proudly tell everyone that he is their son.
If we change the negative mentality of the people around us,
That's our third and most important task.
I hope you liked the work that our NGO is doing, sir.
If you want any more information, our staff will help you.
I'm sorry. I need to leave urgently.
You just have to set your mind to it.
Even if you lose all the organs of your body, it's still possible.
You just have to take care of your one organ.

who was born with no hands or legs. He is one of the top ten
I am one of His miracles.
Today, even I want to ask you the same question.
I am also one of His miracles.
Are you a miracle too? Yes.
Louder. Are you a miracle too? Yes!
You should keep your hair open, Ananya.
what made you come back and say that you want to marry Ananya?

Do your parents know you're here?
I don't care about what they think.
I really want to marry Ananya.
Shekhar But I don't want to marry him.

Ananya, please. You know I have countless stories of An

He's even come to our house now!

But how does he know Shekhar?
He's the one who was supposed to marry Ananya but ran away, right?
Yes, that's right. Now, he's here because he wants to marry her again.
Do you have a problem with that?
But it's expected from a person like you.

Because I am going to marry her. What?

And yet you guys let me ramble on about myself?

And even if it is fixed, who are you to question us?
Yeah. He's questioning us as if we went to him…

You have no idea what we went through. Why did he come here in the first
You know why this issue was stretched so much?

told me about Ananya's surprise birthday party,

because we have known each other for so many years.

I mean I just wanted to say that…
you are also a nice girl.

for what you have done for Ananya.

these two had a constant belief in their instincts about each other.

and to be honest, that's confusing.

Tomorrow, if you say that you regret your decision,

then thank you so much, but I really don't need it.
you'd better not take me lightly.

Because I fell in love with that Ananya,
who had completely forgotten that she had lost her hands.

who has two eyes, one nose, two legs,
can fall in love with her,
can ask her to marry him.

I am not interested in spending my life…
with someone who is so weak and has such a negative mentality.
I was always looking for something exceptional.

But luckily, I found my best shot very early in my life.
And that shot is you, Ananya.
Now, you tell me, what do you want me to think about?
I believe we only rethink our decision when we have options.
I only know that I love you, and no one can do anything about it.

Just tell me how much you liked it.
whether I will be able to do it or not.

that a mother does for her child.
